title._content: Onrust in Rotterdamse Afrikaanderbuurt / Turkish guest workers facing riots in Rotterdam

description._content: 925-8058 Nationaal Archief/Anefo/Bert Verhoeff Nederlands: Onrust in Rotterdamse Afrikaanderbuurt, verontwaardigde Turkse gastarbeiders 14 augustus 1972 English: Turkish guest workers facing riots in Rotterdam, The Netherlands, August 1972.
